mapper.insert: INSERT INTO policy_board (psnum, subject, content, reg_date, hitcount, savefilename, originalfilename, block, userId) VALUES (policy_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, SYSDATE, 0, #{savefilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalfilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(b.psnum), 0) FROM policy_board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.id
AND b.block = 0

SELECT b.psnum, b.subject, b.content AS content, b.reg_date, b.hitcount, b.savefilename, b.originalfilename, b.block, m.nickname FROM policy_board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.id
AND b.block = 0
ORDER BY b.psnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT b.psnum, b.subject, b.content AS content, b.hitcount, b.reg_date, b.savefilename, b.originalfilename, b.block, m.nickname, b.userId FROM policy_board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.id WHERE b.psnum = #{psnum} AND b.block = 0

SELECT b.psnum, b.subject FROM policy_board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.id
AND (b.psnum > #{psnum}) AND b.block = 0
ORDER BY b.psnum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT b.psnum, b.subject FROM policy_board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.id
AND (b.psnum < #{psnum}) AND b.block = 0
ORDER BY b.psnum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE policy_board SET hitcount = hitcount + 1 WHERE psnum = #{psnum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM policy_board_like WHERE psnum = #{psnum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM policy_board_like WHERE psnum = #{psnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO policy_board_reply (replyNum, psnum, userId, content, reg_date, parentNum, showReply, block) VALUES (policy_board_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{psnum}, #{userId}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, SYSDATE, #{parentNum}, 1, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT r.replyNum, r.userId, m.nickName, r.psnum, r.content AS content, r.reg_date, r.showReply FROM policy_board_reply r JOIN member m ON r.userId = m.id WHERE psnum = #{psnum} AND r.parentNum = 0 AND r.block = 0 ORDER BY r.replyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
